name: NR Coverage-Triggered NR Session Continuity
summary: The NR Coverage-Triggered NR Session Continuity feature provides basic connected mode

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.systemInformationBlock24  EUtranCellTDD.systemInformationBlock24
parameters.description: See MOM description.  The attribute references struct SIB24. The struct                                 has the following members:   NRFreqRelation.tReselectionNR  NRFreqRelation.tReselectionNrSfMedium  NRFreqRelation.tReselectionNrSfHigh

parameters.name: GUtranFreqRelation.allowedPlmnList
parameters.description: The attribute can be used for restricting UEs from mobility to an NR                                 network of another operator.

parameters.name: FreqPrioNR.arfcnValueNRDl
parameters.description: Priority of NR frequencies is defined in                                     FreqPrioNR MO instance as a child of                                     RATFreqPrio MO.

parameters.name: FreqPrioNR.cellReselectionPrio
parameters.description: Priority of NR frequencies is defined in                                     FreqPrioNR MO instance as a child of                                     RATFreqPrio MO.

parameters.name: FreqPrioNR.connModeMobilityPrio
parameters.description: Priority of NR frequencies is defined in                                     FreqPrioNR MO instance as a child of                                     RATFreqPrio MO.

parameters.name: ExternalBroadcastPLMNInfo.pLMNIdList
parameters.description: The PLMN is checked against the HRL of the UE for the RwR to NR with                                 validation procedure.

parameters.name: ExternalGUtranCell.pLMNIdList
parameters.description: The PLMN is checked against the HRL of the UE for the RwR to NR with                                 validation procedure.

parameters.name: ExternalBroadcastPLMNInfo.nRTAC
parameters.description: The nRTAC is checked for the RwR to NR with validation procedure.

parameters.name: ExternalGUtranCell.nRTAC
parameters.description: The nRTAC is checked for the RwR to NR with validation                             procedure.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.changeNotification  EUtranCellTDD.changeNotification
parameters.description: The attribute references struct ChangeNotificationSIBs. The                                     changeNotificationSIB24 struct member is                                 added.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.mappingInfo  EUtranCellTDD.mappingInfo
parameters.description: The attribute references struct MappingInfoSIBs. The                                     mappingInfoSIB24 struct member is                                 added.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_MEAS_CONFIG_B1_NR
events.type: When a UE is to be configured using RRC Connection                                     Reconfiguration to report measurements on NR with Report                                     Configuration of type B1 measurement.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_MOBILITY_EVAL
events.type: The EVENT_VALUE_NR enum value is introduced for                                     the EVENT_PARAM_REDIRECT_RELEASE_INFO event parameter.  The EVENT_VALUE_MEAS_REPORT_B1_BEST_CELL enum                                     value is introduced for the EVENT_PARAM_MOBILITY_TRIGGER event                                     parameter.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_NR_FREQUENCY_EXCLUDED
events.type: Sent when NR frequency is excluded from mobility back to NR.  The following event enum values and event parameter are                                         introduced:  EVENT_PARAM_MOBILITY_MODE_PER_EXCLUDED_NR_FREQUENCY     EVENT_VALUE_CONN_MODE_MOBILITY_BWISHO     EVENT_VALUE_IDLE_MODE_MOBILITY_BWISHO

events.name: EVENT_PARAM_MOBILITY_TRIGGER
events.description: The EVENT_VALUE_MEAS_REPORT_B1_BEST_CELL enum                                 value is introduced.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012324 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012324 MO instance.
